description: Complete visual overhaul of the admin dashboard and all subpages to achieve an ultramodern, professional aesthetic. Includes: (1) Design system refresh with consistent spacing, typography, and color palette; (2) Modern card-based layouts with subtle shadows and rounded corners; (3) Enhanced data tables with better visual hierarchy, hover states, and inline actions; (4) Improved navigation with collapsible sidebar, breadcrumbs, and quick actions; (5) Loading states, skeleton screens, and micro-animations; (6) Dark mode support; (7) Responsive layouts optimized for all screen sizes; (8) Modern form designs with floating labels and validation feedback; (9) Updated iconography and illustration system; (10) Dashboard widgets with interactive charts and real-time updates.
